definition: to patrol/to make one's rounds/classifier for rounds of drinks

pinyin: fan3 jian4 ting3 xun2 hang2 dao3 dan4

sentences.english: The AWACS detection effectiveness cruising along racetrack is researched.
sentences.chinese: 对预警机跑道形巡航时的探测效能问题进行了研究。

sentences.english: Stealth Bombers now gain a bonus to fitting siege missile launchers instead of cruise missile launchers.
sentences.chinese: 隐轰获得了适合会战发射器的加成来代替巡航。

sentences.english: At higher or ‘cruising’ speeds, things are far less certain.
sentences.chinese: 在更高或是巡航速度下，事情就变得更不确定了。

sentences.english: If you plan to cruise, how many crew may be aboard?
sentences.chinese: 如果你计划巡航，船上将有多少位水手？

sentences.english: In April 2007, HAYABUSA started full cruising operation to return to earth.
sentences.chinese: 2007年4月，隼巡航开始全面运作，以返回地球。

sentences.english: This height is also the frequent cruising altitude of commercial airliners.
sentences.chinese: 这一高度也是商务航线的常用巡航高度。

sentences.english: The next morning I joined a two-day cruise up the Mekong.
sentences.chinese: 第二天上午，我参加了为时两天的湄公河巡航游。

sentences.english: Or are you cruising just above the tree tops - or stuck on the runway?
sentences.chinese: 你是在树丛上空巡航呢，还是滞留在机场跑道上？

sentences.english: Our cruising speed is now up to 400 kms.
sentences.chinese: 我们的巡航度现在达到了400公里。

sentences.english: This might mean that the V-tails could be locked out in normal cruising flight.
sentences.chinese: 这或许意味着V型尾翼在超音速巡航时会被锁定。

sentences.english: It can also be operated using touchscreen and cruise-control functions.
sentences.chinese: 也可以用触摸屏操作和巡航功能进行控制。

sentences.english: "You learn how to use your systems on patrol," he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“你在巡航中才能学习如何使用你的系统。

sentences.english: Simulation has been used only anti-ship cruise missiles against a super tanker.
sentences.chinese: 只是曾经模拟过使用反舰巡航导弹打击一艘超大油轮。

sentences.english: Dongfeng-21 missiles and cruise missiles, this is first appearance.
sentences.chinese: 东风21导弹和巡航导弹这次都是第一次亮相。

sentences.english: The ship's maximum cruising speed is 22 knots.
sentences.chinese: 该船的最大巡航速度为22节。

sentences.english: Fairway programming is one of the key factors to improve the breakthrough probability of cruise missile.
sentences.chinese: 航路规划是提高巡航导弹突防概率的关键因素之一。

definition: to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
distant seas/the open ocean (far from the coast)
Liaoning, the first aircraft carrier commissioned into the PLA Navy (commissioned in 2012)
battle group/naval formation headed by an aircraft carrier
(of aircraft) to take off and land
